titleInfo.title: Hurricane Relief Benefit at the Grand Ole Opry House

mods.abstract: Two color window card (green and purple on white) announcing the Hurricane Relief Benefit featuring John Anderson, Mark Chesnutt, Billy Dean, Diamond Rio, Joe Diffie, Darryl and Don Ellis, Ralph Emery, Lee Greenwood, Alan Jackson, Tracy Lawrence, Cathy Martindale, The Mavericks, Pirates of the Mississippi, Mike Reid, Sedona, Karl Shannon, Doug Shannon, Doug Stone, Marty Stuart, Curtis Wright, and Trisha Yearwood at the Grand ole Opry House on October 19.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
